ing.item: BY 26-INCH SHEET PAN TEMPERATURE: 450 F. OVEN

directions.step:
:
1. USE CANNED BISCUIT MIX. PREPARE ACCORDING TO INSTRUCTIONS ON CONTAINER. FOR CONVECTION OVEN, SEE NOTE 2. *ALL NOTES ARE PER 100 PORTIONS
NOTE: 1. FOR BROWNER TOPS: IN STEP 1, ADD 8 OZ (1 CUP) GRANULATED SUGAR TO DRY INGREDIENTS.
Recipe Number: D00101
SERVING SIZE: 2 BISCUITS
From the <Army Master Recipe Index File> (actually used today!). Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
